items.text: full outside off, looks to hit through cover. Ball rolls out to midwicket off the inside half
items.shortText: Cremer to Sunzamul Islam, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle stump, pushed to midwicket's left
items.postText:
ali: "How can Zimbabwe get a bonus point?" - They have to achieve a run rate 1.25 times of Bangladesh's eventual run rate

Janet James: "Also worth mentioning that Cremer's milestone make him only the fifth Zimbabwean to 100 ODI wickets and 4th all time highest wicket taker for the country. "
items.shortText: Cremer to Sunzamul Islam, 1 run

items.text: short and wide outside off, too far for the batsman to make connection on the cut
items.shortText: Chatara to Sunzamul Islam, 1 wide

items.text: good length in the corridor, pushed to point with an open face
items.shortText: Chatara to Sunzamul Islam, no run

items.text: outside edge and there's no one at slip. It's a poor ball, lots of width for the No. 9 to swing his bat at. Third man has no chance
items.shortText: Chatara to Sunzamul Islam, FOUR runs

items.text: full and just outside off, flicked to long-on with the angle
items.shortText: Chatara to Sunzamul Islam, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, beaten on the outside edge as he looks to guide it to third man
items.shortText: Chatara to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, beaten again as he attempts the same shot
items.shortText: Chatara to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, zips past the outside edge as he wafts at this
items.shortText: Chatara to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: tossed up outside off, gets to the pitch and drives to long-off's right
items.shortText: Cremer to Sunzamul Islam, 1 run

items.text: good length at middle stump, flicked to midwicket's left on the front foot
items.shortText: Cremer to Mustafizur Rahman, 1 run

items.text: good length on off stump, defended into the leg side off the inside half
items.shortText: Cremer to Sunzamul Islam, no run

items.text: good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
items.shortText: Cremer to Sunzamul Islam, no run

items.text: good length on off stump, steps out and drives straight back to the bowler
items.shortText: Cremer to Sunzamul Islam, no run

items.text: good length on middle stump, reaches out and gets low to connect nicely on this sweep and bisect deep square and deep midwicket
items.shortText: Cremer to Sunzamul Islam, FOUR runs

items.text: offcuter, full on off stump. Defended into the off side from the crease
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: offcutter at a length on leg stump. Pushed to short fine and they manage to steal a single despite a mix-up
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mustafizur Rahman, 1 run

items.text: short ball angled in at the batsman, who steps out and cramps himself. Can't get bat on the hoick
items.shortText: Jarvis to Sunzamul Islam, no run

items.text: offcutter, jags away off the surface and beats the outside edge as he pushes forward
items.shortText: Jarvis to Sunzamul Islam, no run

items.text: good length and in at middle stump, tapped to deep midwicket from the crease
items.shortText: Jarvis to Sunzamul Islam, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, backs away and pushes it straight to backward point
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.preText: Chatara has switched ends. Around the wicket.
items.text: taken at short fine by Muzarabani. If the Leaning Tower ever falls, it'll look like that. Chatara bounces the advancing batsman who can't connect on the hook. Top edge hangs up and to the right of Muzarabani, who follows it like he's in a trance, stretches out his long hands, takes the catch and falls down in slo-mo
items.shortText: Chatara to Sunzamul Islam, OUT

dismissal.text: Sunzamul Islam c Muzarabani b Chatara 19 (24b 3x4 0x6) SR: 79.16

items.text: short and wide outside off, slashes and misses
items.shortText: Chatara to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: that's a cruel wide calls. Floats this slower ball full and wide outside off. It lands inside the tram line, but the umpire doesn't reckon so
items.shortText: Chatara to Mustafizur Rahman, 1 wide

items.text: short ball outside off, slashes and misses
items.shortText: Chatara to Mustafizur Rahman, no run
